question: Which country won the 2017 Sultan Azlan Shah Cup?
explanation: Great Britain defeated Australia 4-3 in the final and won the 2017 Sultan Azlan Shah Cup. 2017 Sultan Azlan Shah Cup was the 26th edition of the Sultan Azlan Shah Cup. It was held in Ipoh,Perak, Malaysia from 29 April - 6 May 2017.
